1.title: Patricia Clarkson's Peasant Dress Memories
1.plot: "Sharp Objects" star and Golden Globe nominee Patricia Clarkson recalls her first on-screen role working with Kevin Costner in Brian De Palma's 'The Untouchables.'

1.title: Steve Carell Recalls Meeting John Hughes During His Last Film
1.plot: Steve Carell's first IMDb Credit as the waiter Tesio in the 1991 film Curly Sue may have been a small role -- so small, in fact, that he didn't even have any lines. But that doesn't mean it wasn't a memorable one. In addition to getting to meet the late John Hughes in what would be his last film, Carell got to hang out with some pretty big stars.

2.title: Jennifer Lawrence Dishes on Her 'Embarrassing' First IMDb Credit
2.plot: When Jennifer Lawrence went in to audition for "Monk" in 2006, she thought it was a pretty big deal and even told everyone back home. However, the role wasn't exactly what she thought! Find out why the Joy star is still embarrassed about her first IMDb credit.

3.title: Rooney Mara's Accidental First IMDb Credit
3.plot: 'Carol' actress Rooney Mara might be a big star now. But in 2005, when she played Classroom Girl in 'Urban Legends: Bloody Mary,' she was just the little sister of Kate Mara. Find out how visiting her big sis on the set turned into her very first IMDb credit

4.title: Cate Blanchett on What She Learned from Her First IMDb Credit
4.plot: Cate Blanchett's first IMDb role was a memorable one for the 'Carol' star! Hear from Cate about what she learned playing Mrs. Haines in "Police Rescue: The Loaded Boy" back in 1993.

5.title: Christian Bale on His 'Spunky' First IMDb Credit
5.plot: When 'Big Short' star Christian Bale played Alexei in "Anastasia: The Mystery of Anna" in 1986, he was still new to American lingo. Find out how Christian got confused by the terminology his director used!

6.title: Bryan Cranston on His Surprising First IMDb Credit
6.plot: Bryan Cranston's first IMDb credit was definitely ahead of its time in 1982. Just ask the actor himself. IMDb caught up with the 'Trumbo' star, who told us about portraying Sam in "Crisis Counselor: Bisexual Marriage" and why it was so much fun to play!

7.title: Sarah Paulson on Her First Time Being on Camera in First IMDb Credit
7.plot: Sarah Paulson might be a household name these days, thanks in part to her role as Marcia Clark in "American Crime Story." But the actress got her start like many others before her in the long-running series "Law & Order." Find out what Chris Noth did to throw the young actress off when she was first starting out!

8.title: Elle Fanning on Playing a Younger Version of Sister Dakota in First IMDb Credit
8.plot: Elle Fanning may have been destined to follow in her older sister Dakota's footsteps. But when she was just 2-yearsold,chance led to her very first IMDb credit in 'I Am Sam.'

9.title: Kate Beckinsale's Crybaby First Credit
9.plot: Kate Beckinsale's first role was in 1975 when she was just 18 months old! Find out what producers did to make her cry.

10.title: Brace Yourself for Chris Evans' Adorable First Credit
10.plot: Chris Evans first role was a dream for any teenager -- because he had his braces removed to play the part. Find out more about his adorable first role!

11.title: Steven Spielberg's "Smoggy" First Credit
11.plot: Before Steven Spielberg became an Oscar-winning director, he was determined to win a different award. Learn about the short Western that became his first IMDb credit and the Boy Scout merit badge he earned along the way.

12.title: Kristen Stewart's Thirsty First Credit
12.plot: Kristen Stewart dishes on the thirsty work that led to her first IMDb credit back in 1999.

13.title: 'Suicide Squad' Cast Reveal First Credits
13.plot: The cast of 'Suicide Squad' have come a long way since their first IMDb credits. IMDb sits down with Jay Hernandez, Will Smith, Cara Delivigne, Adam Beach, Adewale Akinnuoye- Agbaje, Joel Knnaman, and Viola Davis about their very first roles!

14.title: Anna Kendrick's "Amazing" First Credit
14.plot: Find out why Anna Kendrick thinks her 2003 first IMDb credit was "amazing." Also, discover how much the young starlet made for her film debut.

15.title: Casey Affleck on Reuniting with Kevin Bacon, Kyra Sedgwick in First IMDb Credit
15.plot: When Casey Affleck was just 9-years-old, he was cast in his first role in a PBS movie. Not only did the young actor get to play Kevin Bacon's son, but he also witnessed the first meeting between Kevin and future wife Kyra Sedgwick! Plus, find out about the Affleck's memorable run-in with the famous couple years later.

16.title: Amy Adams' Memorable First Credit in 'Drop Dead Gorgeous'
16.plot: Find out why Amy Adam's first role as Leslie Miller in 1999's 'Drop Dead Gorgeous' was such a memorable experience for the A-list actress.

17.title: Alexander Skarsgard's Adorable First Credit
17.plot: Need proof that Alexander Skarsgard was quite the adorable little boy? Check out his very first IMDb credit and discover what he remembers from the experience. Plus, 'Tarzan' co-star Margot Robbie joins the conversation to find out how this first role compares to his others.

18.title: Chris Pine on Being Part of a Team in "ER" in First IMDb Credit
18.plot: Chris Pine's very first IMDb credit was a small part in the hit ensemble show "ER," where he worked alongside some pretty big names. Find out which A-list guest star Pine met and what the cast taught him about working in a team.

19.title: Keanu Reeves' "Cool" First Credit
19.plot: Keanu Reeves landed his first role in 1984 as "Teen Client" in the Canadian TV series "Hangin' In." Find out why the then 16-year-old found the role so "cool."

20.title: Eric Stonestreet's "Important" First Credit
20.plot: Eric Stonestreet was already an IMDb fan when he earned his first IMDb credit in 1999 for playing Chester in "Dharma & Greg." The young actor was just as excited about getting added to IMDb as he was about landing the part.

21.title: David Oyelowo's Painful First Credit
21.plot: David Oyelowo lied about being able to roller blade to get a part in 'Maisie Raine' in 1998 just after finishing acting school. Even though he got the job, he says he paid the price for it in the form of painful bumps and bruises.

22.title: Lupita Nyong'o's Silent First Credit
22.plot: Lupita Nyong'o's first IMDb credit had very few lines. None, in fact. She was cast out of Actors Access to play in 'East River,' a silent film, as a woman who meets a tourist and has a variety of experiences exploring the city with him.

23.title: Mira Nair's Gossipy First Credit
23.plot: Mira Nair was one of few Indian actresses in Jackson, Mississippi when she got her first IMDb credit playing in 'Mississippi Masala' back in 1991. She said her mother hated how she looked, but "it was about looking as tarty as possible."

24.title: Watch Jesse Eisenberg "Get Real" About His First Credit
24.plot: Jesse Eisenberg plays one of the most famous villains in 'Batman vs. Superman,' but in 1999 he played unassuming Kenny Green in the TV show "Get Real."

25.title: Emily Blunt Gets an Acting Lesson
25.plot: Emily Blunt landed her first role as Queen Isolda in the 2003 film, 'Warrior Queen.' Find out how she quickly learned the difference between stage and screen acting on the set 'Warrior Queen.'

26.title: Justin Theroux Misses the Cut
26.plot: Justin Theroux's recalls his first IMDb credit as journalist Gary Andrews in the Darren Star series "C.P.W" ("Central Park West") and how most of it ended up on the cutting room floor.

27.title: Triple Threat Jon Favreau's Many First Credits
27.plot: Jon Favreau has a few IMDb first credits. So, when we sat down with him to talk about his latest flick, 'Jungle Book,' we asked him about all three of his firsts in directing, producing, and acting.

28.title: First Credits for the Cast of "Goliath"
28.plot: IMDb sits down with "Goliath" cast members Billy Bob Thornton, Molly Parker, Sarah Wynter, and Tania Raymonde to discuss their very first credits listed on IMDb.

29.title: Julia Roberts on Burning Down the House in First IMDb Credit
29.plot: Roberts is an A-list actress who has traveled all over the world. But when she got her start in "Crime Story" in 1986, the Las Vegas shooting location seemed worlds away. Find out why an alarm in her hotel room had her a bit scared!

30.title: Matthew McConaughey's First Credit: Mysteriously Shirtless
30.plot: Long before he became a "True Detective," Matthew McConaughey reenacted a true crime in his IMDb first credit. The Oscar-winner reveals how his portrayal of a bare-chested victim on "Unsolved Mysteries" led to the capture of a real-life murderer.

31.title: Best First Credit: Dwayne Johnson or Kevin Hart?
31.plot: It's a battle of A-listers when 'Cenral Intelligence' stars Kevin Hart and Dwayne Johnson compare their first credits. Find out whose credit sounds like an adult movie.

32.title: Auli'i Cravalho Becomes a Disney Musical Star
32.plot: Learn how Hawaiian teenager Auli'i Cravalho landed the lead role in 'Moana' and became the latest in a long line of Disney musical stars.

33.title: David Yates' "Non-Professional" First Credit
33.plot: IMDb sits down with director David Yates to discuss his first directing credit, a short film titled 'When I Was a Girl' from 1988.

1.title: Martin Scorsese's "Juvenile" First Credit
1.plot: IMDb sits down with director Martin Scorsese to discuss his first directing credit, a short film titled 'Vesuvius VI' from 1959.

2.title: Life Was a Beach for Michelle Wiliams' First Credit
2.plot: Michelle Williams talks about her first credit on "Baywatch" and how the memory is still dear to her heart.

3.title: Danny Boyle's First Credit: "I Had No Idea What I Was Doing"
3.plot: Director Danny Boyle reveals how an actor helped with his first directing credit, a TV movie titled 'Scout' from 1987.

4.title: Viola Davis Remembers Her First Scene with Timothy Hutton
4.plot: Viola Davis recalls shooting her first-ever scene with Timothy Hutton for the 1996 film 'Substance of Fire.'

5.title: Denzel Washington Recalls the Joy of Discovering Per Diem
5.plot: Denzel Washington recalls landing his first part and subsequently running through the streets of New York City to celebrate.

6.title: 'La La Land' Stars Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling on First Credits
6.plot: A fifteen-year-old Emma Stone singing an Alanis Morrisette song and a baby-faced Ryan Gosling acting with Gilbert Gottfried? 'La La Land' stars tease each other about their first credits.

7.title: Oscar Isaac as the Pool Boy in "Embarrassing" First Credit
7.plot: Playing the pool boy in 1996's 'Illtown' was an "embarrassing" first credit for Oscar Isaac. Also, find out which actors the 'X-Men' star remembers fondly, including a star who tap danced for him.

8.title: Edgar Wright's First Credit: "Cringeworthy... But Funny"
8.plot: Director Edgar Wright talks about his first IMDb credit, an "amateur" movie he made when he was still at school.

9.title: James McAvoy Punched Co-Star and Helped Andy Serkis in First IMDb Credit
9.plot: James McAvoy recalls how Andy Serkis helped calm his nerves before his first film, The Near Room (1995), and how he accidentally "knocked out" co-star Adrian Dunbar.

10.title: Jennifer Aniston Was Fired From Doug Liman's First IMDb Credit
10.plot: Director Doug Liman recalls how Jennifer Aniston was dropped from his first movie, which included early roles for her future "Friends" co-star Matthew Perry and "Ally McBeal" star Calista Flockhart.

11.title: Julianne Moore Talks Playing Twins in First Credit
11.plot: Julianne Moore recalls her talented co-stars on a daytime soap, and how playing twins 30 years ago helped with a future role.

imdb.title: IMDb First Credit
plot: Actors, directors, and more share anecdotes about their first IMDb credit.
